resources.string:
This app display prime numbers.
 By pressing the button below, you will access a database of prime numbers and display the largest yet computed prime number.
 In the next screen you may choose to display larger or smaller primes than this.
 If the requested prime is not present in the database it is computed and added to the database.
 The database is saved into the internal storage of the android system and resumed when opening the app again.
